```{r load-pkg, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library (repometrics)
```
This page shows aggregate community health scores for all repositories within
the "reconhub" and "epiverse-trace" organizations. Higher values describe
repositories with greater community health scores.

```{r load-data}
dat_models <- readRDS ("results-org.Rds") |>
    as.data.frame ()
```
```{r ojs-in-models, echo = FALSE}
ojs_define (models_in = dat_models)
```
```{ojs}
models = {
    return transpose(models_in).map(row => ({
        ...row,
        date: new Date(row.date)
    }));
}
models_len = models.length
```


```{ojs}
Plot.plot({
    height: 20 * models_len,
    marginLeft: 60,
    marginRight: 160,
    marginTop: 50,
    marginBottom: 50,
    axis: null,
    x: {
        axis: "top",
        grid: true,
        label: "Community Health"
    },
    y: { grid: true },
    marks: [
        Plot.barX(models, {
            y: "package",
            x: "final",
            sort: {y: "-x" },
            fill: "final",
        }),
        Plot.barX(models,
            Plot.pointer(
            {
                y: "package",
                x: "final",
                sort: {y: "-x" },
                stroke: "gray",
                fill: "final",
                strokeWidth: 2,
            })
        ),
        Plot.text(models, {
            x: (d) => d.final < 0 ? 0 : d.final,
            y: "package",
            text: "package",
            textAnchor: "start",
            fontSize: 16,
            dx: 5
        })
    ],
    color: {
        scheme: "Cool",
        type: "ordinal"
    }
})
```
